body.name: hosote Nightstand with Charging Station, Flip Top End Table with USB Ports and Outlets Farmhouse Night Stand Side Bedside Table with Storage for Bedroom Living Room (Rustic Grey, Small)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 59 mins
features: FARMHOUSE END TABLE - Simulation drawer, combined with a metallic design, making the whole end table chic and aesthetic, proportional lines, beautiful colors, all of which we designed specifically for you who like farmhouse or modern style.

STORAGE MASTER - Both a end table and a side table, with concealed and open storage to keep your room organized. Features a open shelf and large hidden space, convenient for you to store magazines, mobile phones and private belongings, etc.

END TABLE WITH CHARGING STATION - 2 AC Outlets & 2 USB Ports with Cable Management for 5.9ft long power supply cord that is convenient for charging your phone, tablet, lamp, game console and etc.. The storage space is flip top and the drawers are only decorative and cannot be moved.

IDEAL FOR A LIVING ROOM, BEDROOM OR STUDY - You can put in the living room as side table, an accent table, or a small coffee table, of course you also can put it in your bedroom as nightstand, also be a right choice! All these differences and functions were meant to give you a wonderful home.

WORRY FREE USAGE - Fine texture MDF board enhance the sturdiness which make the bearing capacity up to 30 lb. Comes with all necessary hardware and an illustrated instruction manual to help you set up this nightstand quickly and without difficulties. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problem.
body.description: It is the best choice as a bedside table, side table, end table, nightstand. Fit in most spaces in living room and bedroom Hidden storage space and 1-tier shelves, a combination of private and open storage. This nightstand can meet all you demand when you want to put some books, snacks or privacy item on the bedside table. Easy to clean with a soft, dry cloth (avoid the use of chemicals and household cleaners) Following the manual, step by step installation will help you to install the bedside table quickly and correctly. If you want a quicker installation, use your electric screwdriver to tighten the screws, which will complete the installation faster.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Flip Top End Table with Charging Station The design of hosote nightstand is a blend of Modern Trends & Vintage Traditionalism. You can put this night stand in your bedroom, living room, as a bedside table, sofa side table, couch table, farmhouse end table etc..

Adds a warm charming element to your room Material: Particleboard, Metal Product Size: 15.35''(L) * 15.75'' (W)* 21.7''(H) What you will get: Nightstand*1, Assembly Kit*1, Assembly Manual*1 It is the best choice as a bedside table, side table, end table, nightstand. Fit in most spaces in living room and bedroom Hidden storage space and 1-tier shelves, a combination of private and open storage. This nightstand can meet all you demand when you want to put some books, snacks or privacy item on the bedside table. Easy to clean with a soft, dry cloth (avoid the use of chemicals and household cleaners) Following the manual, step by step installation will help you to install the bedside table quickly and correctly. If you want a quicker installation, use your electric screwdriver to tighten the screws, which will complete the installation faster.

Metal Flip Hinge Flip hinges of high hardness and corrosion resistance, the flip angle is 180°, and the desktop is flush when closed. Recessed Power Strip Inside features 2 standard plug outlets and 2 USB ports for which you can easily charge your electronics like smartphone, Pad, lamp and etc.. Storage Master A large hidden storage compartment perfect for storing any items such as remotes, books, or toys. No more mess or clutter!

Shelf for Storage Open shelf offer you ample space to store and display which you can place your decorative phone, books and etc. Simulation Drawer To reflect the retro elements, we have designed decorative drawers (which cannot be pulled out). Textured Finish The textured particle board is beautiful and also easy to clean: simply wipe it with a soft, dry cloth. Sturdy Metal Frame This side table of ours is supported by an all-metal stand, which makes the structure of the end table more sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect side table!
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I needed! Sturdier than I thought it would be considering its small size. Easy to assemble and instructions were clear! Absolutely love the blues on top! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Cheap wood and the design has a strange texture? It felts very soft, almost velvety, but with a good wipe down that went away. Took about 30 mins to put together, didn't have a screw driver (you will need one) but not the worst thing. Also not a drawer but a hinge that opens the top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars llego en excelentes condiciones y tiempo de entrega la estimada
reviews.reviewText: llego en excelentes condiciones y tiempo de entrega la estimada

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice look and feel. Not sure if it was worth my time in setup.
reviews.reviewText: Just finished setup. They look exactly like the pictures. Very Sturdy. IMO it was overly complicated setup for the size of the table. I feel some parts could have been preassembled. Way too many screws so I suggest putting them together at the same time. Will update in a few weeks on functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Cheap quality. Stripped screws. 2 hours to put together because of defective screw holders. Impossible to put together because of that. Useless. Waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HANDY LITTLE TABLE
reviews.reviewText: This table is so handy. The fact that it had the electrical and charging connections is the reason I bought this. I did not expect it to be as heavy duty as it is. The assembly part was easy and the storage area is so helpful. The finish is nice. It does have a rough corner though so the score wasn't all 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars What the??? Screws suck
reviews.reviewText: Awful construction!!! Screws are too short! Save your money!!!! Horrible!!!!
